mindustry.entities.units

Class BuildRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • mindustry.entities.units.BuildRequest

  • public class BuildRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for storing build requests. Can be either a place or remove request.

      • x

      • y

        Position and rotation of this request.

      • rotation

        public int rotation
        Position and rotation of this request.

      • block

        public Block block
        Block being placed. If null, this is a breaking request.

      • breaking

        public boolean breaking
        Whether this is a break request.

      • hasConfig

        public boolean hasConfig
        Whether this request comes with a config int. If yes, any blocks placed with this request will not call playerPlaced.

      • config

        public java.lang.Object config
        Config int. Not used unless hasConfig is true.

      • originalX

        public int originalX
        Original position, only used in schematics.

        Whether construction has started for this request, and other special variables.

      • animScale

        public float animScale
        Visual scale. Used only for rendering.

        public void pointConfig(arc.func.Cons<arc.math.geom.Point2> cons)
        If this requests's config is a Point2 or an array of Point2s, this returns a copy of them for transformation. Otherwise does nothing.
